/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene below.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city.

Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to bathe the street in their light as dusk falls. Despite the absence of people in the frame, one can almost hear the hum of traffic and the murmur of city life. The image is a snapshot of urban life, frozen in time yet brimming with stories waiting to be told.
